## ==The unexpected path from honey to geometry, why plumbers might be the new tech bros, and the secret sauce for spelling success.==

==**In this edition:**==

- ==Why your kid's next obsession might be Ancient Greece==
- ==The "boring" path to millions (no hoodie required)==
- ==Spelling struggles? We've got solutions==

## ==**When Bees Lead to Euclidean Geometry**==

[https://platform.twitter.com/embed/Tweet.html?dnt=false&embedId=twitter-widget-0&%3D%3D&frame=false&hideCard=false&hideThread=false&id=1881836118024630761&lang=en&origin=https%3A%2F%2Fopened-daily.beehiiv.com%2Fp%2Fskip-stanford-buy-a-business-the-new-success-formula-118&sessionId=b076dd84865d4ad8f2cd92975b8e0578800a8929&theme=light&widgetsVersion=2615f7e52b7e0%3A1702314776716&width=550px](https://platform.twitter.com/embed/Tweet.html?dnt=false&embedId=twitter-widget-0&%3D%3D&frame=false&hideCard=false&hideThread=false&id=1881836118024630761&lang=en&origin=https%3A%2F%2Fopened-daily.beehiiv.com%2Fp%2Fskip-stanford-buy-a-business-the-new-success-formula-118&sessionId=b076dd84865d4ad8f2cd92975b8e0578800a8929&theme=light&widgetsVersion=2615f7e52b7e0%3A1702314776716&width=550px)

==The best learning moments are rarely planned a semester in advance. One curious question snowballs into a geometry obsession, and suddenly you're ordering Euclid on Amazon Prime. That's open education done right.==

### ==üìä TREND==

## ==**Main Street Millionaires**==

==While most career counselors are still pushing the "college or bust" narrative, Codie Sanchez is building== [==a media empire==](https://contrarianthinking.co/?utm_source=opened-daily.beehiiv.com&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=skip-stanford-buy-a-business-the-new-success-formula-118) ==around a contrarian idea:==

==**For most people, "boring" businesses like plumbing, electrical work, and local services are a faster and safer path to wealth than fancy degrees or Silicon Valley startups.**==

==She‚Äôs on ‚Äúa mission to help 1 million people become financially and philosophically free.‚Äù==

==In her new book== [==_Main Street Millionaire_==](https://www.amazon.com/Main-Street-Millionaire-Extraordinary-Businesses/dp/0593718615?utm_campaign=Contrarian%20Thinking%20Newsletter&utm_medium=email&_hsmi=340848624&utm_content=340848624&utm_source=hs_email)==, Sanchez demolishes the myth that you need a revolutionary app idea or a prestigious MBA to build wealth. Instead, she advocates for buying existing, profitable businesses ‚Äì the ones providing actual services people need ‚Äì and then growing them.==

==For a taste of her trademark contrarian thinking,== [==check out this recent thread on a British entrepreneur who turned a wire basket manufacturer into the world‚Äôs largest ad agency==](https://x.com/Codie_Sanchez/status/1882074265815540127?utm_source=opened-daily.beehiiv.com&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=skip-stanford-buy-a-business-the-new-success-formula-118)==.==

### ==üõ†Ô∏è TOOL==

## ==**When Writing's a Wrestle**==

==An OpenEd parent recently reached out about their second grader struggling with writing and spelling (while crushing it at reading). If this is you, here's our crowd-sourced wisdom from our parent/teacher community:==

==**Top picks:**==

- [==The Good and the Beautiful==](https://www.goodandbeautiful.com/?utm_source=opened-daily.beehiiv.com&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=skip-stanford-buy-a-business-the-new-success-formula-118)==: Lives up to its name with gorgeous materials and systematic instruction that somehow manages to make spelling... dare we say it... beautiful?==
- [==Spelling Power==](https://www.spellingpower.com/?utm_source=opened-daily.beehiiv.com&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=skip-stanford-buy-a-business-the-new-success-formula-118)==: The Swiss Army knife of spelling programs - one book, all grades, and activity cards that turn practice into play==
- [==IEW (Institute for Excellence in Writing)==](https://iew.com/?utm_source=opened-daily.beehiiv.com&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=skip-stanford-buy-a-business-the-new-success-formula-118)==: Because sometimes structure is your friend==
- [==Night Zookeeper==](https://www.nightzookeeper.com/?utm_source=opened-daily.beehiiv.com&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=skip-stanford-buy-a-business-the-new-success-formula-118)==: For when you need spelling practice with a side of whimsy==
